db:abstract.db:para: This is a simple page for testing purposes only.

db:article.db:para: QDoc generates documentation for software projects. It does this by extracting QDoc comments from project source files. QDoc comments are signified by a C-style-like comment tag followed by an exclamation point, like this: /*! This text is contained within QDoc comment tags. */.

db:section.db:title: Supported file types
db:section.db:para: QDoc parses .cpp and .qdoc files. It does extract comments from header (.h) files.
